member.name: T:IFCNodes.CachedMeshData
member.summary: Cached mesh data for MappedItem reuse. Stores untransformed geometry that can be transformed for each instance.

member.name: T:IFCNodes.ResolvedGeometry
member.summary: Resolved geometry containing vertices, triangles, and bounding box.

member.name: T:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper
member.summary: Helper class for extracting and processing IFC geometry. Uses optimized extraction paths: direct extraction for triangulated data, XbimTessellator for tessellatable geometry, and XbimGeometryEngine for parametric geometry.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.ResolveProductGeometry(Xbim.Ifc.IfcStore,Xbim.Ifc4.Interfaces.IIfcProduct,Xbim.Geometry.Engine.Interop.XbimGeometryEngine,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,IFCNodes.CachedMeshData},System.String)
member.summary: Resolves product geometry using the default "Body" representation.
member.param: The IFC store containing the product.
The product to extract geometry from.
The geometry engine for parametric geometry processing.
Optional cache for MappedItem geometry reuse. Key format: "{SourceModel}:{EntityLabel}".
Name of the source model for cache key generation.
member.returns: Resolved geometry or null if extraction fails.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.ResolveProductGeometryByRepresentation(Xbim.Ifc.IfcStore,Xbim.Ifc4.Interfaces.IIfcProduct,System.String,Xbim.Geometry.Engine.Interop.XbimGeometryEngine,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,IFCNodes.CachedMeshData},System.String)
member.summary: Resolves product geometry for a specific representation identifier.
member.param: The IFC store containing the product.
The product to extract geometry from.
The representation identifier to use (e.g., "Body", "Box"). Empty string uses priority selection.
The geometry engine for parametric geometry processing.
Optional cache for MappedItem geometry reuse.
Name of the source model for cache key generation.
member.returns: Resolved geometry or null if extraction fails.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.ResolveProductGeometry(Xbim.Ifc.IfcStore,Xbim.Ifc4.Interfaces.IIfcProduct,Xbim.Geometry.Engine.Interop.XbimGeometryEngine)
member.summary: Resolves product geometry using the default "Body" representation. Overload without caching support for backward compatibility.
member.param: The IFC store containing the product.
The product to extract geometry from.
The geometry engine for parametric geometry processing.
member.returns: Resolved geometry or null if extraction fails.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.ResolveProductGeometryByRepresentation(Xbim.Ifc.IfcStore,Xbim.Ifc4.Interfaces.IIfcProduct,System.String)
member.summary: Resolves product geometry for a specific representation identifier. Overload without caching support for backward compatibility.
member.param: The IFC store containing the product.
The product to extract geometry from.
The representation identifier to use (e.g., "Body", "Box"). Empty string uses priority selection.
member.returns: Resolved geometry or null if extraction fails.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.ResolveProductGeometryByRepresentation(Xbim.Ifc.IfcStore,Xbim.Ifc4.Interfaces.IIfcProduct,System.String,Xbim.Geometry.Engine.Interop.XbimGeometryEngine)
member.summary: Resolves product geometry for a specific representation identifier. Overload with geometry engine but without caching support.
member.param: The IFC store containing the product.
The product to extract geometry from.
The representation identifier to use (e.g., "Body", "Box"). Empty string uses priority selection.
The geometry engine for parametric geometry processing.
member.returns: Resolved geometry or null if extraction fails.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.SelectRepresentation(Xbim.Ifc4.Interfaces.IIfcProduct,System.String)
member.summary: Selects the appropriate representation based on identifier or priority.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.CheckIfNeedsGeometryEngine(Xbim.Ifc4.Interfaces.IIfcRepresentation,Xbim.Tessellator.XbimTessellator)
member.summary: Checks if any item in the representation requires the geometry engine.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.ItemNeedsGeometryEngine(Xbim.Ifc4.Interfaces.IIfcRepresentationItem,Xbim.Tessellator.XbimTessellator)
member.summary: Recursively checks if an item needs geometry engine processing.
Processes a representation item using the appropriate extraction method.
Processes a MappedItem with caching support.
Processes a MappedItem with caching support.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.ApplyCachedMesh(IFCNodes.CachedMeshData,Xbim.Common.Geometry.XbimMatrix3D,System.Collections.Generic.List{Xbim.Common.Geometry.XbimPoint3D},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32[]})
member.summary: Applies cached mesh data with a transform to the output lists.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.ExtractTriangulatedFaceSet(Xbim.Ifc4.Interfaces.IIfcTriangulatedFaceSet,Xbim.Common.Geometry.XbimMatrix3D,System.Collections.Generic.List{Xbim.Common.Geometry.XbimPoint3D},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32[]})
member.summary: Directly extracts geometry from IIfcTriangulatedFaceSet (already triangulated).

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.ReadShapeGeometry(System.String,Xbim.Common.Geometry.XbimMatrix3D,System.Collections.Generic.List{Xbim.Common.Geometry.XbimPoint3D},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32[]})
member.summary: Reads binary shape geometry data and extracts vertices and triangles.
Reads shape geometry data and extracts vertices and triangles.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.CollectParametricGeometry(Xbim.Common.Geometry.IXbimGeometryObject,System.Collections.Generic.List{Xbim.Common.Geometry.IXbimSolid},System.Collections.Generic.List{Xbim.Common.Geometry.IXbimShell},System.Collections.Generic.List{Xbim.Common.Geometry.IXbimFace})
member.summary: Collects parametric geometry objects into appropriate lists.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.CollectSolidsOnly(Xbim.Common.Geometry.IXbimGeometryObject,System.Collections.Generic.List{Xbim.Common.Geometry.IXbimSolid})
member.summary: Collects only solid geometry objects.
Tessellates a geometry object and adds the result to the output lists.
Applies opening subtractions to solid geometry.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.GetLocalPlacementTransform(Xbim.Ifc4.Interfaces.IIfcLocalPlacement,Xbim.Geometry.Engine.Interop.XbimGeometryEngine)
member.summary: Gets the local placement transform for an opening element.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.CalculateMaterialLayerOffset(Xbim.Ifc4.Interfaces.IIfcElement)
member.summary: Calculates the material layer offset transform for an element.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.TransformPoint(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,Xbim.Common.Geometry.XbimMatrix3D)
member.summary: Transforms a point using a matrix.

member.summary: Transforms a list of vertices using a matrix.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.TransformSolids(System.Collections.Generic.List{Xbim.Common.Geometry.IXbimSolid},Xbim.Common.Geometry.XbimMatrix3D)
member.summary: Transforms a list of solids.

member.summary: Transforms a list of shells.

member.summary: Transforms a list of faces.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.CreateTransformFromPlacement(Xbim.Ifc4.Interfaces.IIfcAxis2Placement)
member.summary: Creates a transform matrix from an IIfcAxis2Placement.

member.summary: Creates a transform matrix from an IIfcCartesianTransformationOperator3D.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.CreateTransformFromOperator2D(Xbim.Ifc4.Interfaces.IIfcCartesianTransformationOperator)
member.summary: Creates a transform matrix from an IIfcCartesianTransformationOperator (2D).

member.name: M:IFCNodes.GeometryHelper.InvertMatrix(Xbim.Common.Geometry.XbimMatrix3D)
member.summary: Inverts a transformation matrix.

member.summary: Computes the bounding box for a list of vertices.

member.name: T:IFCNodes.IFCClashDetection
member.summary: Provides clash detection between IFC elements using bounding box and mesh analysis.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCClashDetection.DetectClashes(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Detects geometric clashes between two sets of elements. Hard clashes: volumetric mesh intersections only. Soft clashes: touch and clearance violations (requires clearance > 0).
member.param: List of GlobalIds for the first element set.
List of GlobalIds for the second element set.
Minimum required clearance distance in model units. When 0, only hard clashes (intersections) are detected. When greater than 0, also detects soft clashes (touch and clearance violations).
Optional tolerance for geometric comparisons in model units. Default is -1, which uses the model's precision value. Set a positive value to override the model precision.
member.returns: Dictionary containing clash results and statistics.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCClashDetection.GetClashSummaryByElement(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns clash results grouped by element, showing which elements each element clashes with.
member.param: List of GlobalIds for the first element set.
List of GlobalIds for the second element set.
Minimum required clearance distance in model units. Default is 0, which only detects hard clashes.
Optional tolerance for geometric comparisons in model units. Default is -1, which uses the model's precision value.
member.returns: List of dictionaries, each containing an element's GlobalId and its list of clashing elements.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCClashDetection.DetectSelfClashes(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Detects all clashing pairs within a single set of elements.
member.param: List of GlobalIds to check for internal clashes.
Minimum required clearance distance in model units. Default is 0, which only detects hard clashes.
Optional tolerance for geometric comparisons in model units. Default is -1, which uses the model's precision value.
member.returns: Dictionary containing clash results.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCClashDetection.GetClashPairs(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns only the GlobalId pairs of clashing elements.
member.param: List of GlobalIds for the first element set.
List of GlobalIds for the second element set.
Minimum required clearance distance in model units. Default is 0, which only detects hard clashes.
Optional tolerance for geometric comparisons in model units. Default is -1, which uses the model's precision value.
member.returns: List of string arrays, each containing two clashing GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCClashDetection.GetClashingElements(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns GlobalIds of all elements that have at least one clash.
member.param: List of GlobalIds for the first element set.
List of GlobalIds for the second element set.
Minimum required clearance distance in model units. Default is 0, which only detects hard clashes.
Optional tolerance for geometric comparisons in model units. Default is -1, which uses the model's precision value.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds of elements involved in clashes.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCClashDetection.GetNonClashingElements(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns GlobalIds of elements from setA that have no clashes with setB.
member.param: List of GlobalIds for the first element set.
List of GlobalIds for the second element set.
Minimum required clearance distance in model units. Default is 0, which only detects hard clashes.
Optional tolerance for geometric comparisons in model units. Default is -1, which uses the model's precision value.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds of elements without clashes.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCClashDetection.FilterClashesByType(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.String)
member.summary: Filters clashes by type.
member.returns: List of clashes matching the specified type.

member.name: T:IFCNodes.IFCExplore
member.summary: Provides model-wide discovery methods to explore what exists in a loaded IFC model.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCExplore.GetTypes(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all unique IFC class types used in the model with usage counts. Optionally filter to subtypes of a base class.
member.param: Optional base class to filter results to only subtypes of this class (e.g., "IfcBuildingElement" returns only walls, doors, windows, etc.). Use IFCSchema.GetAllEntityNames() or IFCSchema.GetEntitySubtypes() to discover valid values. Empty returns all product types.
member.returns: List of dictionaries containing IfcClass, Count, and PredefinedTypes used.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCExplore.GetTypeObjects(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all IfcTypeObject instances in the model. Optionally filter by type class.
member.param: Optional type class filter to return only specific type objects (e.g., "IfcWallType" returns only wall types, "IfcDoorType" returns only door types). Use IFCSchema.GetAllEntityNames() or IFCSchema.GetEntitySubtypes("IfcTypeObject") to discover valid values. Empty returns all type objects.
member.returns: List of dictionaries containing GlobalId, Name, IfcClass, and AppliedToCount.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCExplore.GetMaterials(IFCNodes.IFCModel)
member.summary: Returns all materials in the model with usage counts.
member.returns: List of dictionaries containing Name, Category, UsageCount, and HasProperties.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCExplore.GetMaterialStructures(IFCNodes.IFCModel)
member.summary: Returns all material layer sets, profile sets, and constituent sets in the model.
member.returns: List of dictionaries with full material structure details.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCExplore.GetPropertySets(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all property sets in the model with usage information. Optionally filter by property set name.
member.param: Optional PSet name filter. Empty returns all.
member.returns: List of dictionaries with PSet details.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCExplore.GetQuantitySets(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all quantity sets in the model with usage information. Optionally filter by quantity set name.
member.param: Optional QSet name filter. Empty returns all.
member.returns: List of dictionaries with QSet details.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCExplore.GetPropertyValues(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns property values distribution or detailed values for a property across the model.
member.param: If true, returns all values with element GlobalIds. If false, returns value counts.
member.returns: Dictionary mapping values to counts (verbose=false) or list of value details (verbose=true).

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCExplore.GetQuantityValues(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns quantity values distribution or detailed values for a quantity across the model.
member.param: If true, returns all values with element GlobalIds. If false, returns statistics (Min, Max, Sum, Count, Average).
member.returns: Dictionary with statistics (verbose=false) or list of value details (verbose=true).

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCExplore.GetClassifications(IFCNodes.IFCModel)
member.summary: Returns all classification systems used in the model.
member.returns: List of dictionaries with classification system details.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCExplore.GetDocuments(IFCNodes.IFCModel)
member.summary: Returns all documents referenced in the model.
member.returns: List of dictionaries with document details and usage counts.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCExplore.GetGroups(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all groups, systems, and zones in the model. Optionally filter by group type.
member.param: Optional filter: "IfcGroup", "IfcSystem", "IfcZone", or empty for all.
member.returns: List of dictionaries with group details.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCExplore.GetSpatialElements(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all spatial elements in the model. Optionally filter by spatial type.
member.param: Optional filter: "Site", "Building", "Storey", "Space", or empty for all.
member.returns: List of dictionaries with spatial element details.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCExplore.GetSpatialStructure(IFCNodes.IFCModel)
member.summary: Returns the complete spatial hierarchy tree of the model.
member.returns: Dictionary representing the project tree structure.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCExplore.GetProjectContext(IFCNodes.IFCModel)
member.summary: Returns complete project context including units, coordinate system, and project info.
member.returns: Dictionary with project context details.

member.name: T:IFCNodes.IFCFilter
member.summary: Provides element filtering methods. All filters return List of GlobalIds. Use Dynamo's native List.SetIntersection for AND, List.SetUnion for OR, and List.SetDifference for NOT operations.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.ComparisonOperators
member.summary: Returns all valid comparison operators for filter nodes. Use these values for the 'op' parameter in filter methods.
member.returns: List of valid operator strings.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.RelationshipTypes
member.summary: Returns all valid relationship types for ByRelationship filter.
member.returns: List of valid relationship type strings.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.SpatialTypes
member.summary: Returns all valid spatial types for BySpatialContainment filter.
member.returns: List of valid spatial type strings.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.AssociationTypes
member.summary: Returns all valid association types for ByAssociation filter.
member.returns: List of valid association type strings.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.AttributeNames(System.String)
member.summary: Returns valid attribute names that can be used with ByAttribute filter. Optionally filter by IFC class to get class-specific attributes.
member.param: Optional IFC class name to get class-specific attributes.
member.returns: List of valid attribute names.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.AllElements(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all element GlobalIds in the model. Optionally filter to a base class and its subtypes.
member.param: Optional base class filter (e.g., "IfcWall", "IfcBuildingElement"). Empty returns all products.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.ElementsInSpatial(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns GlobalIds of all elements contained in a spatial structure element.
member.param: GlobalId or Name of the spatial element (Site, Building, Storey, Space). Use IFCExplore.GetSpatialElements() to discover available spatial elements.
If true, includes elements in nested spatial structures.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.ElementsInGroup(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns GlobalIds of all elements assigned to a group, system, or zone.
member.param: GlobalId or Name of the group.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.ElementsOfTypeObject(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns GlobalIds of all elements typed by a specific type object.
member.param: GlobalId or Name of the type object.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.ElementsWithMaterial(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns GlobalIds of all elements using a specific material.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.ElementsWithClassification(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns GlobalIds of all elements with a specific classification.
member.param: Classification system name or reference code to search for.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.ByAttribute(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.String,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Filters elements by schema attribute value. Common attributes: GlobalId, Name, Description, Tag, ObjectType, PredefinedType, IfcClass.
member.param: Attribute name to filter by. Use AttributeNames() to see valid options.
Comparison operator. Use ComparisonOperators() to see valid options.
Value to compare against. Use null for "null"/"!null" operators.
member.returns: Filtered list of GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.ByProperty(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.String,System.Object,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Filters elements by property value. Searches both instance properties and type properties.
member.param: Comparison operator. Use ComparisonOperators() to see valid options.
Second value for "between" operator. Only required when comparisonOperator is "between".
member.returns: Filtered list of GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.ByPropertySet(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Filters elements by property set existence.
member.returns: Filtered list of GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.ByQuantity(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.String,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Filters elements by quantity value.
member.param: Second value for "between" operator. Only required when comparisonOperator is "between".
member.returns: Filtered list of GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.ByAssociation(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Filters elements by association (material, classification, document, etc.).
member.param: Association type. Use AssociationTypes() to see valid options.
Optional value to match (e.g., material name, classification code).
How to match the value: "=", "contains", etc.
member.returns: Filtered list of GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.ByRelationship(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Filters elements by relationship type.
member.param: Relationship type. Use RelationshipTypes() to see valid options.
Optional GlobalId of target element for specific relationship checks.
member.returns: Filtered list of GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.BySpatialContainment(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Filters elements by spatial containment.
member.param: Spatial type filter. Use SpatialTypes() to see valid options: "Any", "Site", "Building", "Storey", "Space".
Optional GlobalId or Name of specific spatial element. Use IFCExplore.GetSpatialElements() to discover available spatial elements.
How to match the name: "=", "contains", etc.
member.returns: Filtered list of GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.BySourceModel(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Filters elements by their source model file name.
member.returns: Filtered list of GlobalIds.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCFilter.ByTypeObject(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Filters elements by type object assignment.
member.param: Optional type name or class to match.
member.returns: Filtered list of GlobalIds.

member.name: T:IFCNodes.IFCSchema
member.summary: Provides static schema knowledge about IFC4x3 entities, properties, and quantities. These nodes do not require an IFC model - they query embedded schema metadata.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSchema.GetEntityInheritance(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the full inheritance chain for an IFC class. Example: IfcWall → IfcBuildingElement → IfcElement → IfcProduct → IfcObject → IfcObjectDefinition → IfcRoot
member.returns: List of class names from most specific to most general.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSchema.GetEntitySubtypes(System.String)
member.summary: Returns all direct and indirect subtypes of an IFC class. Example: IfcBuildingElement returns IfcWall, IfcWallStandardCase, IfcDoor, IfcWindow, etc.
member.returns: List of all subtype class names.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSchema.GetEntityAttributes(System.String)
member.summary: Returns schema-defined explicit attributes for an IFC class including inherited attributes.
member.returns: List of dictionaries containing Name, Type, IsOptional, and DeclaredIn for each attribute.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSchema.GetEntityRelationships(System.String)
member.summary: Returns schema-defined inverse relationships for an IFC class including inherited relationships. Inverse relationships define how entities connect to each other (e.g., HasAssociations, IsDefinedBy).
member.returns: List of dictionaries containing Name, RelatedEntity, AggregationType, and DeclaredIn.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSchema.GetStandardPropertySets(System.String)
member.summary: Returns standard buildingSMART Property Sets applicable to an IFC class. Includes inherited PSets from parent classes.
member.returns: List of dictionaries containing Name, Definition, TemplateType, ApplicableEntities, and Properties.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSchema.GetStandardQuantitySets(System.String)
member.summary: Returns standard buildingSMART Quantity Sets applicable to an IFC class. Includes inherited QSets from parent classes.
member.returns: List of dictionaries containing Name, Definition, TemplateType, ApplicableEntities, and Quantities.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSchema.GetEnumerationValues(System.String)
member.summary: Returns valid values for an IFC enumeration type. Example: IfcWallTypeEnum returns MOVABLE, PARAPET, PARTITIONING, PLUMBINGWALL, etc.
member.returns: List of valid enumeration values.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSchema.GetPredefinedTypeValues(System.String)
member.summary: Returns valid PredefinedType values for an IFC class. Automatically finds the corresponding enum (e.g., IfcWall → IfcWallTypeEnum).
member.returns: List of valid PredefinedType values.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSchema.GetAllEntityNames
member.summary: Returns all available IFC entity class names in the schema. Useful for discovering what entity types exist.
member.returns: List of all IFC entity class names.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSchema.GetAllStandardPropertySetNames
member.summary: Returns all standard Property Set names from buildingSMART.
member.returns: List of all standard PSet names.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSchema.GetAllStandardQuantitySetNames
member.summary: Returns all standard Quantity Set names from buildingSMART.
member.returns: List of all standard QSet names.

member.name: T:IFCNodes.IFCSpatialQueries
member.summary: Provides spatial and geometric queries on IFC models using a Bounding Volume Hierarchy. These queries detect geometric relationships not explicitly defined in the IFC schema.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSpatialQueries.GetModelPrecision(IFCNodes.IFCModel)
member.summary: Returns the model's geometric precision.
member.returns: The precision value in model units.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSpatialQueries.GetOneMeterValue(IFCNodes.IFCModel)
member.summary: Returns the value of one meter in the model's units.
member.returns: One meter expressed in model units.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSpatialQueries.GetSpatialHierarchy(IFCNodes.IFCModel)
member.summary: Builds and returns the spatial index structure for all loaded models. Uses a Bounding Volume Hierarchy (BVH) for efficient spatial queries.
member.returns: Dictionary containing the BVH structure, element count, and coordinate warnings.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSpatialQueries.GetElementBoundingBox(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the axis-aligned bounding box of an element.
member.returns: Dictionary with MinX, MinY, MinZ, MaxX, MaxY, MaxZ, SizeX, SizeY, SizeZ, CenterX, CenterY, CenterZ.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSpatialQueries.QueryByBoundingBox(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns all elements whose bounding boxes intersect the specified region.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds of elements in the region.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSpatialQueries.GetIntersectingElements(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all elements whose bounding boxes intersect (overlap) with the source element. Intersection means the boxes share volume.
member.param: The GlobalId of the source element.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds of intersecting elements.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSpatialQueries.GetTouchingElements(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all elements whose bounding boxes touch the source element. Touching means the boxes share a boundary but do not overlap.
member.param: The GlobalId of the source element.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds of touching elements.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSpatialQueries.GetContainedElements(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all elements whose bounding boxes are fully contained within the source element.
member.param: The GlobalId of the source element.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds of contained elements.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSpatialQueries.GetContainingElements(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all elements whose bounding boxes fully contain the source element.
member.param: The GlobalId of the source element.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds of containing elements.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSpatialQueries.GetNearbyElements(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns all elements within a specified distance from the source element.
member.param: The GlobalId of the source element.
Maximum distance to search in model units.
member.returns: List of dictionaries containing GlobalId and Distance for each nearby element.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSpatialQueries.GetElementsOnStorey(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all elements located on a specific building storey. Uses explicit storey elevation and height when available, falls back to geometric detection.
member.param: The GlobalId or Name of the building storey.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds of elements on the storey.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSpatialQueries.GetSpaceBoundingElements(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all elements that bound a specific space. Combines explicit IFC relationships and geometric proximity detection.
member.returns: List of dictionaries containing GlobalId, Name, IfcClass, SourceModel, and RelationType.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCSpatialQueries.GetConnectedElements(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all elements geometrically connected to the source element. Includes intersecting, touching, and contained elements. For explicit IFC relationships, use IFCQuery.GetConnectivity instead.
member.param: The GlobalId of the source element.
member.returns: List of dictionaries containing GlobalId, Name, IfcClass, SourceModel, and RelationType.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.Internal.SemanticQueryResolver.ResolveQueryAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Resolves semantic search query and verifies explicit property/quantity names against model context.

member.name: T:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter
member.summary: Formats markdown text for display in WPF RichTextBox controls using Markdig. Handles special [[shortId|globalId]] patterns for IFC element references.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RenderMarkdown(System.String,System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument)
member.summary: Renders markdown text to a FlowDocument using Markdig.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.ProtectIdPatterns(System.String)
member.summary: Protects [[shortId|globalId]] patterns by replacing them with placeholders.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RenderBlock(Markdig.Syntax.Block,System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Renders a markdown block element.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RenderHeading(Markdig.Syntax.HeadingBlock,System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument)
member.summary: Renders a heading block.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RenderParagraph(Markdig.Syntax.ParagraphBlock,System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Renders a paragraph block.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RenderList(Markdig.Syntax.ListBlock,System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument,System.Int32)
member.summary: Renders a list block (ordered or unordered), with support for nested lists.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RenderTable(Markdig.Extensions.Tables.Table,System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument)
member.summary: Renders a table block with CSV export functionality.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.ExtractTableData(Markdig.Extensions.Tables.Table)
member.summary: Extracts table data as a list of rows, each row being a list of cell strings.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.GetPlainTextFromContainer(Markdig.Syntax.ContainerBlock)
member.summary: Gets plain text from a container block.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.GetPlainTextFromInlines(Markdig.Syntax.Inlines.ContainerInline,System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Gets plain text from inline elements.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RestorePlaceholdersToOriginal(System.String)
member.summary: Restores placeholders to original [[shortId|globalId]] format.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RenderCodeBlock(Markdig.Syntax.LeafBlock,System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument)
member.summary: Renders a code block.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RenderQuoteBlock(Markdig.Syntax.QuoteBlock,System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument)
member.summary: Renders a quote block.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RenderThematicBreak(System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument)
member.summary: Renders a thematic break (horizontal rule).

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RenderInlines(Markdig.Syntax.Inlines.ContainerInline,System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Renders inline elements to an InlineCollection.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RenderInline(Markdig.Syntax.Inlines.Inline,System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Renders a single inline element.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RenderTextWithPlaceholders(System.String,System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Renders text containing placeholders, replacing them with appropriate ID inlines.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.AddTextRun(System.String,System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a text run with optional bold/italic/strikethrough formatting.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RenderLink(Markdig.Syntax.Inlines.LinkInline,System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Renders a hyperlink.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.AddGlobalIdInline(System.String,System.String,System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a GlobalId inline element with shortId tooltip (for tables).

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.RenderPlainTextWithIds(System.String,System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection)
member.summary: Renders plain text with ID processing (for TextBlock targets).

member.name: M:IFCNodes.MarkdownFormatter.ExportBtn_Click(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles CSV export button click.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCGeometry.GetElementGeometry(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Extracts geometry from IFC elements and converts them to Dynamo meshes. Uses pre-cached geometry for optimal performance.
member.param: List of Global Unique IDs (GUIDs) of the elements.
member.returns: List of Dynamo Mesh geometry objects. Null entries indicate elements where geometry is not available.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCGeometry.GetRepresentationGeometry(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Extracts geometry from a specific representation of IFC elements. Note: Only Body representation uses the pre-built cache. Other representations are extracted on-demand. Use GetElementRepresentations from IFCQuery to find available representation identifiers.
member.param: List of Global Unique IDs (GUIDs) of the elements.
The representation identifier to extract (e.g., "Body", "Axis", "FootPrint"). If empty, extracts Body representation or all representations if Body is not found.
member.returns: List of Dynamo Mesh geometry objects. Null entries indicate elements where geometry extraction failed.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCGeometry.GetAllRepresentationGeometries(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Extracts geometry from all representations of IFC elements as separate meshes.
member.param: List of Global Unique IDs (GUIDs) of the elements.
member.returns: Nested list of Dynamo Mesh geometry objects, one list per element containing meshes for each representation.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCGeometry.GetElementBoundingBox(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Returns the Axis-Aligned Bounding Box of elements as Dynamo Solids. Uses pre-cached bounding boxes for optimal performance.
member.param: List of Global Unique IDs (GUIDs) of the elements.
member.returns: List of Dynamo Cuboids representing the bounding boxes in world coordinates. Null entries indicate elements without bounding boxes.

member.name: T:IFCNodes.IFCQuery
member.summary: Provides element-level data retrieval methods. All methods accept a single GlobalId - Dynamo handles list inputs via lacing.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetElementData(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns complete data for an IFC element including identity, type info, attributes, properties, quantities, materials, associations, composition, assignments, connectivity, and spatial containment.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary containing all element data organized by category.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetElementRepresentations(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns detailed information about an element's representations and mapped representations. Useful for understanding geometry structure and debugging extraction issues.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary containing representation details including types, identifiers, and item counts.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetIdentity(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns identity information for an element including GlobalId, Name, Description, Tag, ObjectType, and OwnerHistory.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with identity information.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetTypeInheritanceChain(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns type and inheritance information for an element including IfcClass, InheritanceChain, PredefinedType, and IsAbstract.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with type and inheritance information.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetAttributes(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all explicit attributes for an element based on the IFC schema. Includes attributes inherited from parent classes.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with attribute names and values.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetTypeDefinition(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the type object definition for an element via the IsTypedBy relationship. Includes type properties, quantities, and materials.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with type object data.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetProperties(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all property sets for an element with their properties. For standard PSets, includes metadata about expected and missing properties.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with property set names as keys and property data as values.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetPropertyValue(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a single property value for an element.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: The property value, or empty string if not found.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetQuantities(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all quantity sets for an element with their quantities. For standard QSets, includes metadata about expected and missing quantities.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with quantity set names as keys and quantity data as values.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetQuantityValue(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a single quantity value for an element.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: The quantity value, or 0 if not found.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetAssociations(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all associations for an element including materials, classifications, documents, libraries, constraints, and approvals.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with association categories.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetMaterials(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns material data for an element including single materials, layer sets, profile sets, and constituent sets. If the element has no direct material association, returns the material from its type object.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with material information.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetClassifications(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns classification references for an element.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: List of classification dictionaries.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetDocuments(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns document references for an element.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: List of document dictionaries.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetComposition(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns composition relationships for an element including aggregation (Decomposes/IsDecomposedBy), nesting (Nests/IsNestedBy), openings, coverings, projections, and surface features. Note: This returns explicitly defined IFC relationships only. For geometric-based relationships (e.g., elements physically inside other elements), use IFCSpatialQueries.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with composition relationships.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetOpenings(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns openings (voids) in an element and the elements that fill them.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: List of opening dictionaries with FilledBy information.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetHostElement(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the host element if this element fills a void (e.g., door in wall).
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with host element information, or empty if not filling a void.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetAssignments(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all assignment relationships for an element including groups, systems, zones, actors, processes, controls, and resources.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with assignment categories.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetGroups(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the groups an element is assigned to.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: List of group dictionaries.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetConnectivity(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all connectivity relationships for an element including element connections, path connections, ports, interferences, and space boundaries. Note: This returns explicitly defined IFC relationships only. For geometric-based connectivity (e.g., elements touching or intersecting), use IFCSpatialQueries.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with connectivity categories.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetConnectedElements(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all elements connected to this element via explicit IFC relationships. Note: This returns explicitly defined IFC relationships only. For geometric-based connectivity (e.g., elements touching or intersecting), use IFCSpatialQueries.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: List of connected element dictionaries.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetSpatialContainment(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns spatial containment information for an element including the containing spatial structure and referenced structures.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with spatial containment and placement.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetContainingElement(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the spatial structure element containing this element (e.g., the storey). Note: This returns the explicitly defined spatial containment relationship only. For geometric-based containment, use IFCSpatialQueries.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with containing spatial element, or empty if not contained.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetPlacement(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the placement/location of an element in the model coordinate system.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with X, Y, Z coordinates and placement type.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetSpaceBoundaries(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns space boundaries for an element - which spaces it bounds.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: List of space boundary dictionaries.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.ElementExists(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if an element exists in the model.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) to check.
member.returns: True if element exists, false otherwise.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetElementSummary(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns basic summary information for an element. Useful for quick identification without retrieving all data.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: Dictionary with GlobalId, Name, IfcClass, and PredefinedType.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetElementsOfSameType(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the GlobalIds of all elements that share the same type object as the given element.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds sharing the same type object.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCQuery.GetElementsInSameContainer(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the GlobalIds of all elements in the same spatial container as the given element.
member.param: The Global Unique ID (GUID) of the element.
member.returns: List of GlobalIds in the same spatial container.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCViewer.ViewIFCModel(IFCNodes.IFCModel)
member.summary: Opens a 3D viewer for the loaded IFC Model. Displays all models in a federated project.
member.param: The wrapper containing the IFC Store(s).
member.returns: Status message.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCViewer.ViewWithHighlight(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Opens the viewer and highlights specific elements by their Global Unique IDs (GUIDs). Scans all loaded models to find the matching elements.
member.returns: Status message.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCViewer.ViewWithColorGroups(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}})
member.summary: Opens the viewer and highlights multiple groups of elements with different colors.
member.param: Nested list of GlobalIds where each sublist corresponds to a color.
member.returns: Status message.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCViewer.ViewIsolated(IFCNodes.IFCModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Opens the viewer showing only the specified elements (isolation mode).
member.param: List of GlobalIds to isolate and display.
member.returns: Status message.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCReader.LoadIFCModel(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Loads IFC file(s) into a model wrapper. Automatically discovers and loads related IFC files from the same directory. Geometry is extracted and cached during loading for optimal performance.
member.param: Path to the primary IFC file.
Optional: Directory path to search for additional IFC files. If empty, searches the same directory as the primary file. Set to "none" to disable auto-discovery and load only the specified file.
member.returns: An IFCModel wrapper containing all loaded models with pre-built geometry cache.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCReader.CreateIFCModel(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new empty IFC model with minimal structure. Creates: IfcProject → IfcSite → IfcBuilding → IfcBuildingStorey
member.param: Path where the IFC file will be saved.
Optional name for the project. Default is "New Project".
member.returns: An IFCModel wrapper containing the new model.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCModel.GetProduct(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an IIfcProduct by GlobalId with O(1) lookup.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCModel.GetProductWithStore(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an IIfcProduct and its store by GlobalId with O(1) lookup.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCModel.GetLoadedModelNames
member.summary: Returns the names of all loaded models in the federation.
member.returns: List of model names.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCModel.GetModelSummary
member.summary: Returns summary statistics for all loaded models.
member.returns: Dictionary containing federation status, model count, names, and per-model statistics.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.IFCModel.GetGeometryErrors
member.summary: Returns a list of all geometry extraction errors that occurred during model loading.
member.returns: List of error messages for elements where geometry extraction failed.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.InteractiveViewerWindow.InitializeComponent
member.summary: InitializeComponent

member.name: M:IFCNodes.SpatialIndexManager.BuildGeometryCache(IFCNodes.IFCModel)
member.summary: Builds the geometry cache for all products in the model. Should be called once at model load time.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.SpatialIndexManager.GetModelBounds
member.summary: Gets the overall model bounds from cached data.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.ViewportCapture.CaptureSingleView(Xbim.Presentation.DrawingControl3D,IFCNodes.ViewportCapture.ViewDirection,System.Nullable{Xbim.Common.Geometry.XbimRect3D})
member.summary: Captures a single view from the specified direction.
member.param: Optional: XbimRect3D bounds to focus on. If null, uses entire model bounds.
member.returns: Base64 encoded JPEG image, or null on failure.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.ViewportCapture.CaptureCurrentView(Xbim.Presentation.DrawingControl3D)
member.summary: Captures the current view without modifying the camera.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.ViewportCapture.CaptureMultipleViews(Xbim.Presentation.DrawingControl3D,IFCNodes.ViewportCapture.ViewDirection[],System.Nullable{Xbim.Common.Geometry.XbimRect3D})
member.summary: Captures multiple views with proper camera positioning for each.

member.name: M:IFCNodes.ViewportCapture.TransformBoundsToViewSpace(Xbim.Common.Geometry.XbimRect3D,Xbim.Presentation.DrawingControl3D,System.Double)
member.summary: Transforms a bounding box from model space to view space coordinates. Handles unit conversion and view space translation.
